entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #46590
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #46589
  • Perf regression: plaintext #46588
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https, mvc #46587
  • HttpContext not working in Kestrel in Visual Studio Code #46586
  • Blazor server page code-behind retrieving query string parameters #46583

Closed

  • Can't see generated OpenAPI generated Client after the Latest Update #31087
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Certain HTTP/2 requests failing with a 504 when going through an F5 BIG-IP device #46527
  • Installers are a complete mess #40781
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, https #46582
  • HostingStartup failed to execute after updating to .net 7/asp.core 7 on Azure App Service #45022
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46591
    area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Unify HTTP token parsing code #46580
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks
  • Don't clobber non-default status codes in static files middleware #46578
    area-runtime
  • Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46577
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • fix typo in log message #46540
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46570
    area-signalr
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump up the MIN_PORT for ANCM out of process #46432
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • StatusCodePagesMiddleware: Improving response started verification #46576
    area-web-frameworks
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime
